meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an aunt.
meanings.sent1: Her auntlike smile always made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: She spoke in an auntlike tone, offering gentle advice.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave an auntlike look of disapproval when the dog stole its toy.
meanings.sent4: The old house had an auntlike charm, filled with cozy nooks and family heirlooms.
meanings.sent5: The auntlike scent of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen, bringing back memories of childhood visits.

meanings.definition: In a manner similar to an aunt.
meanings.sent1: She always cared for others auntlike, putting their needs before her own.
meanings.sent2: He dressed auntlike, wearing floral patterns and pearls.
meanings.sent3: The child skipped auntlike down the street, waving at neighbors along the way.
meanings.sent4: The tree swayed auntlike in the breeze, its branches reaching out protectively.
meanings.sent5: The students worked together auntlike, supporting each other through challenges.
